entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg Richardson Int'l Airport 05:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: S 46 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow in open areas this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
